vendor.name: Carta
vendor.description:
Carta (formerly eShares) is an equity ownership, equity management and fund administration platform trusted by thousands of founders, investors, and employees.

For founders, start with your cap table on Carta then issue electronic securities, get 409A valuations and run liquidity events as you grow—your cap table will stay updated automatically. Build your compensation strategy using the best set of private company salary & equity data to ensure you are compensating your team fairly and competitively with Carta total compensation.

For investors, Carta’s fund administration platform enables superior fund and entity launch and management. Let our team of experienced fund accountants streamline your back office. Access our full-service fund administration, fund formation, LP/investor management, ASC 820 valuations, and special purpose vehicle (SPV) formation.. All with a trusted, flexible, tech-forward platform that adapts to your firm.

For private equity, Carta helps hundreds of LLCs manage their cap tables and organize their corporate governance documents. We also provide valuation services and make it easier for you to work with your investors by facilitating cap table sharing, helping with investor updates like K-1 distributions, and executing board consents.
vendor.story: Carta was built for venture by venture, with the mission to create more equity owners and carry earners. Carta has been helping founders and investors since 2012.

offers.name: Carta - Fund Administration
offers.description:
Carta empowers investors and fund managers to efficiently manage their funds, streamline operations, and optimize their investment strategies. Trusted by renowned investors such as Tribe Capital, Base10, and Pear VC, Carta is the go-to solution for managing funds, SPVs, and equity. Carta’s fund administration platform supports more than 8,000 clients, which together represent over $145B in assets under administration.

We're offering 20% off our fund administration services to anyone who signs up through Tech Week Offers.

Steps to Redeem:

To receive 20% off your first year of Carta Fund Administration services, please visit the link here. Please note this offer is only available to new clients.
offers.terms_and_conditions_text: Offer available to new Carta fund administration clients. This offer is not applicable to SPV services. The offer is only applicable to new Carta clients and discount is applied only to the 1st year of services.

offers.name: Get $1000 in Ad Credits When You Sign Up for HubSpot for Startups!
offers.description:
We've teamed up with LinkedIn, VidMob and Google to put together three exclusive new offers to help ramp up your ads strategy to turn prospects into customers. Inform your ads strategy by connecting these platforms to your HubSpot CRM, to generate quality leads and learn exactly which ads are turning from prospects into customers. Sign up for HubSpot for Startups today and get up to $800 in ad credits with Google and LinkedIn!

Steps to Redeem:

  • Invite your startups to sign up for HubSpot for Startups using your partner referral link. ( https://app.hubspot.com/signup-hubspot/hubspot-for-startups?partner-code=0AOSitV8e6jV)
  • Ask startups to fill out the offer form on this page: https://offers.hubspot.com/ad-credit-offers
  • All set! Your startups should keep an eye out for an email with information on how to use their credits.
offers.terms_and_conditions_text:
Google Ad Offer:

  1. This offer is only available for new Google Ad users.
  2. Offer available to customers with a billing address in the United States only. One promotional code per advertiser.
  3. To activate this offer: Click on one of the CTAs on this page to get started with Google Ads in HubSpot for the promotional code to be automatically applied to your account.
  4. To earn the credit: Start advertising! The advertising costs you accrue in this account in the 30 days following your entry of the promotional code, excluding any taxes, will be matched with an advertising credit in the same amount, up to a maximum value of $500.
  5. Once 3 and 4 are completed, the credit will typically be applied within 5 days to the Billing Summary of your account.
  6. Credits apply to future advertising costs only. Credits cannot be applied to costs accrued before the code was entered.
  7. You won’t receive a notification once your credit is used up and any additional advertising costs will be charged to your form of payment. If you don’t want to continue advertising, you can pause or delete your campaigns at any time.
  8. Your account must be successfully billed by Google Ads and remain in good standing in order to qualify for the promotional credit.
  9. Wholly or partially state-owned or government-controlled entities may be excluded.
  10. Amounts may vary by currency.

LinkedIN Offer:

  • One promotional code per advertiser
  • Connect your LinkedIn ads account to HubSpot, only newly connected ad accounts are eligible
  • Users must abide by the LinkedIn advertising coupon code terms and conditions

vendor.name: Hubspot
vendor.description:
HubSpot’s CRM is an all-in-one marketing, sales, content management, and customer service platform.

Learn Why Go Hubspot or get our 2 minute product demos.
vendor.story:
You may have heard the term "inbound" before -- but what is it, exactly? Inbound is a more helpful and human approach to growing your business. It’s a method of attracting, engaging, and delighting people that provides value, and builds trust.

HubSpot's all-in-one marketing, sales, and service platform is built to help you implement inbound and grow better. It’s all powered by the same database, so everyone in your organization -- Marketing, Sales, Services & IT -- is working off the same system of record. This allows for a smoother handoff between teams, and a more delightful experience for your customers.

Startups using the HubSpot Growth Platform acquire and retain more customers with HubSpot’s software, educational resources, and robust integrations.

contacts.position: Head of Startups Israel, CEE & MEA- Hubspot
Head of VC Partnerships, North America

All our locations are private, and turnkey, and offer short-term leases.

vendor.name: Codi
vendor.description: Codi is the office management partner for fast-growing startups and companies. Our Office Management Platform handles all aspects of running your office and ensures your employees can focus on building your business. We take the headache out of running your office.
vendor.story:
Our Services

All services and vendors are managed by your AI office assistant in one simple platform - it includes:

Cleaning

Daily or weekly office cleaning, trash collection, and sanitation — all done discreetly and professionally.

Consumables & Restocking

Never run out of the essentials. We manage and replenish your pantry, kitchen, and bathroom supplies so your team stays fueled and focused.

Design & Furnishing

From layout planning to full interior furnishing, we handle office setup with ergonomic, on-brand designs that reflect your company’s culture. You can easily buy or rent furniture, phone booths, AV equipment, and more.

IT & Technical Support

Need help with Wi-Fi, monitors, or printers? We’ve got you covered. Codi’s IT partner supports onboarding, maintenance, and day-to-day troubleshooting.

Service Requests

Think of us as your office concierge. Just ask your AI office assistant what you need and we’ll handle it - including communicating directly with your building.

vendor.name: Deel
vendor.description:
Deel: Simplifying Global Team Management, Payroll, and HR

Expand Without Limits

Whether you’re ready to hire your first international contractor or scale operations across multiple countries, Deel is your ultimate partner for simplifying global team management. From payroll to immigration and HR, Deel helps businesses move faster, stay compliant, and streamline workforce management. Today, Deel proudly supports over 35,000 customers, including startups and global giants like Nike, Dropbox, Shopify, and Notion.

What Deel Can Do for You:

  1. Hire and Onboard Effortlessly
    • EOR, Global Payroll and PEO services
    • Hiring international contractors and employees across 150+ countries
    • Onboarding new hires in just a few steps
  2. Streamline Workforce Operations
    • Run global payroll seamlessly for employees and contractors in 120+ countries
    • Manage your entire workforce with Deel HR—free of charge
    • Consolidate workforce management on one centralized platform
  3. Stay Ahead with Compliance and Mobility
    • Leave compliance complexities to Deel’s in-house experts
    • Receive comprehensive visa and relocation support with Deel Mobility
    • Mitigate risks with Deel Premium for contractor misclassification
  4. Foster Global Culture
    • Build and scale company culture globally with Deel Engage for performance management, DE&I tracking, and more
    • Provide flexibility and support for your global team members
vendor.story:
Why Choose Deel?

  • Speed and Simplicity: Go from offer letter to onboarding in minutes—no legal or administrative headaches.
  • Compliance First: Deel ensures full compliance with local laws, benefits, and tax regulations.
  • Efficiency Unlocked: Streamline payroll, workforce management, and reporting with one platform.
  • Employee-Centric: Empower your global workforce with localized benefits, early salary access, and more.
  • Trusted Leader: Rated #1 by G2 for Employer of Record and Contractor Management solutions.

How Deel Stands Out

  • 35,000+ Companies Trust Us: Deel supports businesses of all sizes, from startups to enterprises.
  • Global Reach, Local Expertise: With owned entities in 100+ countries, Deel provides market-leading support.
  • $10B+ in Payroll Processed Annually: Our scale and expertise make Deel the industry leader in global workforce management.

Take the Next Step

Whether you’re testing new markets or scaling globally, Deel provides the tools, expertise, and support to grow your workforce with confidence.

Start building your global team today with Deel.

The Deel partnership Manager for Balderton portfolio companies is Anya Roy. Please get in touch anya,roy@deel.com

vendor.name: Zendesk
vendor.description:
Zendesk is a service-first CRM company with support, sales, and customer engagement products designed to improve customer relationships.

Founded in 2007 in Copenhagen, Zendesk is headquartered in San Francisco and has grown up with and served many of the top unicorns of our generation including AirBnB, Uber, Lyft, Shopify, Slack and Zoom. We continue to be a critical tool for thousands of the top startups through our dedicated Zendesk for Startups program.
vendor.story:
The best customer experiences are built with Zendesk

Smart businesses understand the importance of infusing customer service into everything they do. Zendesk is the only CRM company to come from a customer service background. We build support, sales, and customer engagement products to give companies of all sizes the ability to deliver a transparent, responsive, and empowering customer experience.

  • Powerfully easy Zendesk takes on the complexity in customer experience so businesses are empowered to focus on their customers and quickly adapt to meet changing customer needs.
  • Open and flexible Zendesk has an open, flexible architecture built on the public cloud that makes it fast and easy for customers to build and deploy the best customer experiences.
  • Grounded in customer experience Zendesk comes from CX roots, which makes us experts in helping companies deliver great customer experiences.
  • Data-rich Zendesk helps customers harness and make sense of their data in order to improve the entire customer experience.
  • Best Total Cost of Ownership Zendesk delivers the best cost of ownership and fastest time to value for teams of any size.

offers.name: 6 Months Free! All In One Payroll, Benefits, HR
offers.description:
Gusto helps modern business owners build incredible workplaces by providing access to simple, automated payroll, benefits, onboarding, and HR tools — all in one, easy-to-use people platform.

Tens of thousands of tech companies and startups rely on Gusto as their people platform. Gusto enables startups to manage their payroll, HR, benefits, health insurance, remote hiring and onboarding, new state business registration, domestic and international contractors, and R&D tax credits - all from one centralized platform.

Gusto takes care of the fine print, so you don’t have to. Gusto automatically calculates, pays, and files your federal, state and local payroll taxes, as well as W-2s, 1099s, and new Plus, Gusto handles the state and local paperwork when you need to file payroll taxes in a new state - whether you’re hiring someone across the U.S. or your employee is moving stateside.

Built by startup founders, for startup founders. As startup founders themselves, Gusto’s leadership team understands what startups need from their payroll and people platform to quickly scale. More than 500 graduates of Y Combinator have chosen Gusto to date.

Gusto helps startups and tech companies access vital funding through tax credits. Tech companies and startups are prime candidates for federal R&D tax credits. But in the past, they’ve only been available to large companies and public accounting firms. Through Ardius, a Gusto company, we’re democratizing access to tax credits for startups and tech companies of all sizes - with some businesses securing as much as $380k in funding for their day-to-day research and development.

Gusto helps you access talent from around the world. Gusto helps manage cross-border payments to contractors in nearly 100 countries and counting.

Gusto helps you care for your people. Take care of your employees, so they can take care of your business. Gusto handles health insurance administration, while giving your employees easy access to spending and savings accounts and early direct deposit through the Gusto wallet app.

Need help? Get stellar support and expert advice on payroll, benefits, insurance, and people operations by phone, email, or chat.

Steps to Redeem:

Receive your first 6 months of Gusto payroll, benefits, HR, free!

Must use link: https://gusto.com/go/bd/a16ztechweek2024

For questions, please contact Gusto's startup team at startups@gusto.com.
offers.terms_and_conditions_text: These benefits (“Startup Program Benefits”) are available to companies who (i) sign up for Gusto using a Gusto venture capital referral partner’s sign up link and (ii) run one or more paid payrolls (“Qualifying Customers”). Qualifying Customers may not stack Startup Program Benefits with other discounts or promotional offers available from or through Gusto. The monthly discounts will be applied to consecutive months beginning with the month during which Qualifying Customer runs Qualifying Customer’s first paid payroll. Gusto reserves the right to modify or terminate the Startup Program Benefits and/or the Startup Program at any time without notice. Gusto’s Terms of Service (www.gusto.com/about/terms) apply. The receipt of these Startup Program Benefits is in no way contingent upon Qualifying Company’s purchase of any insurance product offered through or by Gusto. Qualifying Company is under no obligation to purchase any insurance product from Gusto or any affiliate or partner of Gusto in exchange for receiving these Startup Program Benefits.

vendor.name: Runway
vendor.description: Runway is the modern and intuitive way to model, plan, and align your business for everyone on your team.
vendor.story:
Finance isn’t just about finance—it’s about everything.

Four years ago, we asked ourselves a simple question:

What if everyone could understand how their business actually works? It’s not a radical idea. Not even a new one. For years, FP&A vendors have been talking about finance that is “strategic' and planning that’s “connected.' We’re still waiting.

In a world where finance is under more pressure than ever to be more strategic and more collaborative — why isn’t this already a solved problem? For the last four years, our team has been trying to find an answer to that question.

This is our answer:

Saving time is not enough. Controls are not enough. Building just for finance is not enough. Those things are all table stakes. For finance to be strategic, we have to collaborate. And real collaboration requires shared context. But you can share every spreadsheet, and open up every source of data — all the context in the world doesn’t matter if the people you work with don’t even understand what they’re looking at.

Understanding. Deep, intuitive, clear understanding — throughout the entire business — that is at the heart of this problem.

That’s why we built Runway: a finance platform that makes all your work — from modeling to data wrangling, from forecasting to scenario planning — finally understandable to you and everyone else in your team. So everyone has the same business context, and can come together to drive the kind of strategic impact you know you can deliver.

Ultimately, seeing is believing.

Through this brief video, through our website, and through stories from teams at AngelList, Superhuman, ConvertKit, and 818 Tequila, we hope to show you a small glimpse of what Runway can do for you. And why we’re here.

When you’re ready, come talk to us. We’d love to help.

vendor.name: Carta
vendor.description:
Carta (formerly eShares) is an equity ownership, equity management and fund administration platform trusted by thousands of founders, investors, and employees.

For founders, start with your cap table on Carta then issue electronic securities, get 409A valuations and run liquidity events as you grow—your cap table will stay updated automatically. Build your compensation strategy using the best set of private company salary & equity data to ensure you are compensating your team fairly and competitively with Carta total compensation.

For investors, Carta’s fund administration platform enables superior fund and entity launch and management. Let our team of experienced fund accountants streamline your back office. Access our full-service fund administration, fund formation, LP/investor management, ASC 820 valuations, and special purpose vehicle (SPV) formation.. All with a trusted, flexible, tech-forward platform that adapts to your firm.

For private equity, Carta helps hundreds of LLCs manage their cap tables and organize their corporate governance documents. We also provide valuation services and make it easier for you to work with your investors by facilitating cap table sharing, helping with investor updates like K-1 distributions, and executing board consents.
vendor.story: Carta was built for venture by venture, with the mission to create more equity owners and carry earners. Carta has been helping founders and investors since 2012.

vendor.name: HSBC Innovation Banking
vendor.description:
HSBC Innovation Banking is a dedicated banking practice focused on the innovation economy, led by Silicon Valley veterans. This offering brings HSBC’s expansive product suite and unmatched international capabilities to support companies in the innovation ecosystem at every stage of their journey. Innovation Banking sits within the bank’s US Commercial Banking business and remains a distinct effort focused on serving companies in technology and healthcare, as well as the investors who support them. The US team is comprised of over 60 bankers in San Francisco, Boston, and New York City as part of this initiative and the team is growing.

The US Innovation Banking team works closely with the 650+ global Innovation Banking colleagues in London, Israel, and Hong Kong - which enables them to serve the banking and debt needs of innovation companies across the world.

HSBC Innovation Banking offers tailored banking and lending products and services that are designed specifically for innovation businesses and their investors. These range from banking to treasury to foreign exchange and market risk solutions, plus a range of debt and credit facilities to suit all sizes of business – especially high growth venture backed businesses.

vendor.description:
Databricks is the data and AI company.

More than 10,000 organisations worldwide — including Block, Atlassian, Rivian, Shell, and over 60% of the Fortune 500 — rely on the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform to take control of their data and put it to work with AI. Databricks is headquartered in San Francisco, CA, with offices around the globe, including in Australia.

The company was founded by the original creators of Lakehouse, Apache SparkTM, Delta Lake, and MLflow. Databricks aims to democratize AI by providing a unified platform for data, analytics, and AI.
vendor.story:
How Databricks can help your startup:

Databricks offers one unified platform that seamlessly integrates data science, engineering, and business team’s workloads. With Databricks, your startup can reduce time-to-market, drive innovation, and unlock the full potential of your product. Our platform allows you to:

  • Address all data, analytics, and AI use cases in one platform
  • Fully manage your data infrastructure to maximize your speed to product
  • Prepare your product for growth with cost-effective scalability and performance
  • Offer infrastructure flexibility with open source and multi-cloud

Databricks startup program:

Our startup program is designed to help you identify, design, and execute on the key business use cases that will drive your growth. It offers:

  • Credit: Up to $50,000 USD in Databricks credits over 12 months to help you build and scale.
  • Experts & Training: Access technical advice from Databricks experts and advanced training to upskill your data teams.
  • Sales & Marketing Support: Amplify your brand through our marketing channels, enabling you to reach more customers and accelerate growth.

vendors.name: Gusto
vendors.description:
Gusto helps modern business owners build incredible workplaces by providing access to simple, automated payroll, benefits, onboarding, and HR tools — all in one, easy-to-use people platform.

Things To Note:

  • Promotional discounts are only available for new Gusto customers or startups
  • Discounts are applied on the backend and will activate automatically when you run payroll for the first time.
vendors.story:
Tens of thousands of tech companies and startups rely on Gusto as their people platform. Gusto enables startups to manage their payroll, HR, benefits, health insurance, remote hiring and onboarding, new state business registration, domestic and international contractors, and R&D tax credits - all from one centralized platform.

Gusto takes care of the fine print, so you don’t have to. Gusto automatically calculates, pays, and files your federal, state and local payroll taxes, as well as W-2s, 1099s, and new Plus, Gusto handles the state and local paperwork when you need to file payroll taxes in a new state - whether you’re hiring someone across the U.S. or your employee is moving stateside.

Built by startup founders, for startup founders. As startup founders themselves, Gusto’s leadership team understands what startups need from their payroll and people platform to quickly scale. More than 500 graduates of Y Combinator have chosen Gusto to date.

Gusto helps startups and tech companies access vital funding through tax credits. Tech companies and startups are prime candidates for federal R&D tax credits. But in the past, they’ve only been available to large companies and public accounting firms. Through Ardius, a Gusto company, we’re democratizing access to tax credits for startups and tech companies of all sizes - with some businesses securing as much as $380k in funding for their day-to-day research and development.

Gusto Global helps you access talent from around the world. Pay employees in the US and Canada. Gusto also helps manage cross-border payments to contractors in nearly 100 countries and counting.

Gusto helps you care for your people. Take care of your employees, so they can take care of your business. Gusto handles health insurance administration, while giving your employees easy access to spending and savings accounts and early direct deposit through the Gusto wallet app.

Need help? Get stellar support and expert advice on payroll, benefits, insurance, and people operations by phone, email, or chat.

Databricks offers one unified platform that seamlessly integrates data science, engineering, and business team’s workloads. With Databricks, your startup can reduce time-to-market, drive innovation, and unlock the full potential of your product. Our platform allows you to:

  • Address all data, analytics, and AI use cases in one platform
  • Fully manage your data infrastructure to maximize your speed to product
  • Prepare your product for growth with cost-effective scalability and performance
  • Offer infrastructure flexibility with open source and multi-cloud

Databricks startup program:

Our startup program is designed to help you identify, design, and execute on the key business use cases that will drive your growth. It offers:

  • Credit: Up to $50,000 USD in Databricks credits over 12 months to help you build and scale.
  • Experts & Training: Access technical advice from Databricks experts and advanced training to upskill your data teams.
  • Sales & Marketing Support: Amplify your brand through our marketing channels, enabling you to reach more customers and accelerate growth.

Expand Without Limits

From payroll to immigration and HR, Deel helps businesses move faster, stay compliant, and streamline workforce management.     • Consolidate workforce management on one centralized platform
  3. Stay Ahead with Compliance and Mobility
    • Leave compliance complexities to Deel’s in-house experts

  4. Foster Global Culture

vendors.story:
Why Choose Deel?

  • Speed and Simplicity: Go from offer letter to onboarding in minutes—no legal or administrative headaches.
  • Compliance First: Deel ensures full compliance with local laws, benefits, and tax regulations.
  • Efficiency Unlocked: Streamline payroll, workforce management, and reporting with one platform.
  • Employee-Centric: Empower your global workforce with localized benefits, early salary access, and more.
  • Trusted Leader: Rated #1 by G2 for Employer of Record and Contractor Management solutions.

How Deel Stands Out

  • 35,000+ Companies Trust Us: Deel supports businesses of all sizes, from startups to enterprises.
  • Global Reach, Local Expertise: With owned entities in 100+ countries, Deel provides market-leading support.
  • $10B+ in Payroll Processed Annually: Our scale and expertise make Deel the industry leader in global workforce management.

Take the Next Step

Whether you’re testing new markets or scaling globally, Deel provides the tools, expertise, and support to grow your workforce with confidence.

Start building your global team today with Deel.

The Deel partnership Manager for Balderton portfolio companies is Anya Roy. Please get in touch anya,roy@deel.com

vendors.name: Runway
vendors.description: Runway is the modern and intuitive way to model, plan, and align your business for everyone on your team.
vendors.story:
Finance isn’t just about finance—it’s about everything.

Four years ago, we asked ourselves a simple question:

What if everyone could understand how their business actually works? It’s not a radical idea. Not even a new one. For years, FP&A vendors have been talking about finance that is “strategic' and planning that’s “connected.' We’re still waiting.

In a world where finance is under more pressure than ever to be more strategic and more collaborative — why isn’t this already a solved problem? For the last four years, our team has been trying to find an answer to that question.

This is our answer:

Saving time is not enough. Controls are not enough. Building just for finance is not enough. Those things are all table stakes. For finance to be strategic, we have to collaborate. And real collaboration requires shared context. But you can share every spreadsheet, and open up every source of data — all the context in the world doesn’t matter if the people you work with don’t even understand what they’re looking at.

Understanding. Deep, intuitive, clear understanding — throughout the entire business — that is at the heart of this problem.

That’s why we built Runway: a finance platform that makes all your work — from modeling to data wrangling, from forecasting to scenario planning — finally understandable to you and everyone else in your team. So everyone has the same business context, and can come together to drive the kind of strategic impact you know you can deliver.

Ultimately, seeing is believing.

Through this brief video, through our website, and through stories from teams at AngelList, Superhuman, ConvertKit, and 818 Tequila, we hope to show you a small glimpse of what Runway can do for you. And why we’re here.

When you’re ready, come talk to us. We’d love to help.
